    Package Description
    com.hamweather.aeris.communication.parameter  

    • Uses of ParameterBuilder in com.hamweather.aeris.communication.parameter

      Methods in com.hamweather.aeris.communication.parameter that return ParameterBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ParameterBuilder ParameterBuilder.withCustomParameter(java.lang.String key, java.lang.String value)
      Adds a custom parameter with the given key and value
      key=:value
      ParameterBuilder ParameterBuilder.withFields(CodedInterface... fields)
      Add fields to the parameter
      ParameterBuilder ParameterBuilder.withFields(java.lang.String... fields)
      Add a fields parameter
      ParameterBuilder ParameterBuilder.withFilter(java.lang.String filter)
      Construct a filter parameter with a string as the value.
      ParameterBuilder ParameterBuilder.withFrom(java.lang.String value)
      Constructs the from parameter with the value.
      from=:string
      ParameterBuilder ParameterBuilder.withLimit(int limit)
      Adds a limit parameter to limit the number of requests.
      ParameterBuilder ParameterBuilder.withPlace()
      Adds a place parameter by using the IP address for the location.
      ParameterBuilder ParameterBuilder.withPlace(AerisLocation... locs)
      Adds a place parameter based on a polygon.
      ParameterBuilder ParameterBuilder.withPlace(Context context)
      Adds a place parameter and uses the phones location, if available.
      ParameterBuilder ParameterBuilder.withPlace(double latitude, double longitude)
      Adds a place parameter with latitude and longitude coordinates
      ParameterBuilder ParameterBuilder.withPlace(double topLat, double leftLon, double botLat, double rightLon)
      Adds a place parameter with latitude and longitude coordinates to use with a EndpointType#WITHIN.
      ParameterBuilder ParameterBuilder.withPlace(java.lang.String value)
      Adds a place parameter with a value.
      ParameterBuilder ParameterBuilder.withPLimit(int value)
      Adds a periods limit parameter with number of periods to limit to.
      ParameterBuilder ParameterBuilder.withPSort(java.lang.String value)
      Adds a period sort parameter with will sort the periods based on a value.
      ParameterBuilder ParameterBuilder.withQuery(java.lang.String value)
      Adds a query parameter with the string value.
      ParameterBuilder ParameterBuilder.withQuery(java.lang.String type, java.lang.String value)
      Adds a more advanced query parameter with a comparator.
      ParameterBuilder ParameterBuilder.withRadius(int distance)
      Adds a radius parameter of a certain distance.
      ParameterBuilder ParameterBuilder.withRadius(int distance, RadiusUnit unit)
      Adds a radius parameter of a certain distance.
      ParameterBuilder ParameterBuilder.withRadius(java.lang.String value)
      Adds a radius parameter with the string as the value.
      ParameterBuilder ParameterBuilder.withSort(java.lang.String value)
      Adds a sort parameter with the value.
      ParameterBuilder ParameterBuilder.withTo(java.lang.String value)
      Adds the to parameter with the given value.
